Talent & Organization Strategy Manager
Accelor Partners | Munich

What you will do
- Lead transformation workstreams with enterprise clients.
- Design org models, talent strategies, and change roadmaps with senior stakeholders.
- Coach client teams and facilitate executive workshops.

What you bring
- 5+ years in consulting or in-house transformation roles.
- Experience with org design, workforce planning, and leadership development.
- Fluent English and good German skills.

Benefits
- Competitive salary with annual bonus and learning stipend.
- 30 days of vacation and hybrid work from Munich.

Hiring process
- Recruiter screen
- Case interview with the strategy lead
- Executive panel and offer discussion

Team
You will join the Transformation Team collaborating with data, HR, and operations experts.
